text: Arnold Pierret was a Belgian gymnast. He competed in the men's team, Swedish system event at the 1920 Summer Olympics, winning the bronze medal. ==References== Category:Year of birth missing Category:Year of death missing Category:Belgian male artistic gymnasts Category:Olympic gymnasts of Belgium Category:Gymnasts at the 1920 Summer Olympics Category:Olympic bronze medalists for Belgium Category:Medalists at the 1920 Summer Olympics Category:Olympic medalists in gymnastics Category:Place of birth missing
title: Arnold Pierret
